SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:IF &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_HOST# = '' : PRINT "Host must not be empty" : EXIT 1 :ENDIF
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 100 :IF &$PLATFORM# = "WINDOWS" @echo off :ENDIF
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_SOA.PRV.INCLUDE.UNDEPLOY_APPLICATION_LOGGING_PARAMS
:IF &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_HOME# <> '' : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_HOME" : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_HOME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_DIR_EXISTS :ENDIF
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
! Attach python script :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "UNDEPLOY_APPLICATION" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_SOA.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_PYTHON
! Attach utils library :ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_SOA.PRV.STORE", "UTILS", C, N :SET &UC4RB_ORACLE_SOA_UTILS# = "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#pck_oracle_soa_utils.py"
! decrypt password :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PASSWORD#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
! prepare general args :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_SOA.PRV.INCLUDE.PREPARE_ARGS
! add custom args depends on your action :SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD#, ' "&UC4RB_ORACLE_SOA_UTILS#"') :SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD#, ' "&UC4RB_SOA_APP_NAME#"') :SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD#, ' "&UC4RB_SOA_APP_REV#"') :SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD#, ' "&UC4RB_SOA_PARTITION#"') :SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD#, ' "&UC4RB_SOA_ONLINE_MODE#"') :SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD#, ' "&UC4RB_SOA_TIMEOUT#"')
! execute python script :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_SOA.PRV.INCLUDE.RUN_WLST :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*Response code=500*") :PROCESS &HND# : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=500 :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
:SET &HND2# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*server timed out*") :PROCESS &HND2# : PRINT "Warning: Maybe you should consider the username/password you entered are correctly!" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1 :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND2#
:SET &EXE# = 0 :SET &HND3# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*Execute python script with WLST*") :PROCESS &HND3# : SET &EXE# = &EXE# + 1 :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND3#
:SET &SET# = 0 :SET &HND3_2# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*set user and password*") :PROCESS &HND3_2# : SET &SET# = &SET# + 1 :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND3_2#
:IF &EXE# <> 0 : IF &SET# = 0 : PRINT "Warning: Maybe you should consider the username/password you entered are correctly!" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1 : ENDIF :ENDIF
:SET &HND4# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*java.net.UnknownHostException*") :PROCESS &HND4# : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1 :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND4#
:SET &HND5# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*Server is most likely down*") :PROCESS &HND5# : PRINT "Maybe you should consider the port number you entered is correctly!" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1 :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND5#
